name: Bounty Hunters Incorporated
description:
== LD COMPO 44 ==

Well, this didn't go too well. The game turned out to be more or less a slot machine without really any strategy or gameplay at all. However I've learned a lot while making it that I will use in the future to possibly make something better, so participating still was a really cool experience

== GAME DESCRIPTION ==

You are a manager at BH Incorporated - a company that takes jobs and send mercenaries to complete them. If the mercenary succeeds, we get paid. If not - we don't (and the mercenary dies).

Your job is to make it to day 30 while maintaining the corporate standard - completing 1 job per day. If you run out of jobs or mercenaries, you will be fired.

On days 10 and 20 you will have a chance to advertise your company to potential clients and employees (provided you have enough gold). Additional mercenaries can also be hired for 200G at any time.
